tasks.label: Symfony: Clear Cache (dev)
tasks.command: docker compose exec -T php php bin/console cache:clear --env=dev --no-warmup

tasks.label: Symfony: Make Migration
tasks.command: docker-compose exec php php bin/console doctrine:migrations:diff

tasks.label: Symfony: Run Migrations
tasks.command: docker compose exec php php bin/console doctrine:migrations:migrate --no-interaction
